title: Den siste dansen (short film about drug use & domestic viole
description:
Lise is a young girl caught between her own heroin abuse and her dominant boyfriend's abuse of her. She tries to maintain the facade by fleeing into her own dreams, to a ballroom where she is the star. But not even the most elegant steps can conceal the fact that her life unravels slowly at the seams.

Cast:
Julia Schacht
Frode Winther

DIRECTOR - Robert Ronning
SCREENPLAY - Erlend B. Valen-Sendstad
CINEMATOGRAPHER - Tor Eigil Scheide (FNF)
EDITING - Lars Christian Nygaard Pedersen (NFK)
ASISTANT CINEMATOGRAPHER - Kristian Myklevold
LIGHT - Finn-Arne Berg
SOUND EDITOR - Ronny Furuseth Kaasa
SOUND RECORDER - John Peter Nordstrand
SCRIPT - Marianne Lindbeck
COSTUMER - Niyan Omer
SET DESIGNER - Anna Strand
MAKEUP ARTIST - June Agneta Myren
CHOREOGRAPHER - Andre Austvoll
STILLS - Lina Holt Halvorsen
